Text: what do you mean run multi version installer it is a rar without any executable files
when i open it with java it says splash recv failed newest java installed.

When you are dealing with Java apps, jar files are the equivalent of an executable file. Just uninstall whatever you believe is Java and install the JRE from Oracle, and I promise you it will work with no issue.
it is the same thing i have been playing minecraft for years
a link would be good since I uninstalled all java and installed what you said and I get a application error unable to start app win 7 x64

Now that I am thinking about it, in your first post you said something about there being a rar file. I stopped packaging the installer in rar files with the last release. In that case I think you may have an older version which will have to be extracted with either 7zip or Winrar before running.
I meant jar executable, and the file java  I downloaded it says I already have it installed I even uninstalled and re installed it. hmm?
I really want to use this and my pc is pissing me off but now it shows java 7 then says unable to load app
I would suggest completely reinstalling Windows. Not just to use this installer, but because your environment seems to really have some issues.
that is one thing I cannot do It is a 2tb all most full with no way to transfer data

i was reading about java problems  and it was because when i installed the newer java's it did not include a file needed to use this as well as adventure craft it was a swt.jar file that was not included now it works, I KNEW IT WOULD THAT IS WHY I NEVER VOTED BAD +1
Well I hope you find the application worth the trouble.
how do you install multiple versions without deleting the other can I have different versions installed at the same time?
I honestly couldn't help you with that.

Just to let everybody know, once the next full version is out I plan on distributing the snapshots separately.  I feel like they are cluttering the combo box. The same goes for pre-releases and non-stable releases.
@Jayzen_Freeze Why would you need to install several versions? This application only takes .2 seconds to install any version available, and carries your saves over to the new install.
